inherent.description: In this mode, the operands are not in the memory

immediate.description: In this mode, when the instruction is assembled, the operand comes immediately after the opcode

direct.description: In this mode, address field in the instruction contains the effective address of the operand and no intermediate memory access is required

indirect.description: In this mode, address field in the instruction contains the memory location where effective address of operand is present.

index.description: In this mode, contents of Index register is added to address part of instruction to obtain effective address

relative.description: In this mode, contents of Index register is added to address part of instruction to obtain effective address
